name: Beanz and Batz
description:
This is a platformer game- Conquer evil batz that want to eat you, while you are saving a princess.

Use w-a-s-d keys to move, or arrow keys to move.

To jump use the space bar.

To slap a bat use mouse 1 (left click).

To interact with the 'shop' go to the item you want to buy and press E.

To go back to the title screen press the esc button (escape key).

Try to make it to the princess to save her and have fun!

Thank you for playing my game.
